featured.text: These bacteria are found in the nose and are easily 18 to the eye when you rub your nose, then your eye.
Just like their cousins grasshoppers and crickets, wetas are able to “sing” by rubbing their leg parts together, or against their lower bodies.

definition.zh_def: 摩擦，擦拭，通常是用手或工具在表面上來回移動以產生光澤或去除污垢。
definition.en_def: To move one's hand or an object back and forth against a surface with pressure.
definition.example: She decided to rub the stain out of her shirt.
